display_long_description:
# Choose your hero and team up to dominate the future bow fight battlefield!

**1. Immersive archery battles**
Delve into the meticulously crafted VR archery simulation experience, refined over three years, ensuring you won't be disappointed!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57572947_834373471354097_6576331293231060095_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=u4pL21hxDoIQ7kNvgHUcuc8&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdVXAFcK0xmdxgOruqEINoQ&oh=00_AYDtrqQiNIVGCPmjujfIBa4Y2XqzBGPHbjshgpA9VzcOWg&oe=670580C9)

**2. Unique movement system**
 We've developed a movement system based on archery, allowing quick mastery through muscle memory, making it irresistible once you've grasped it!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974689_329733770008376_4739301879438428372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=C-jFulPdtdgQ7kNvgGYq7-5&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdVXAFcK0xmdxgOruqEINoQ&oh=00_AYDb7LQmeDEXAb8jf3VZsHhkCqBXDOYNdskcJFgUjhTSPw&oe=67056250)

**3. Hero showdowns, tactical competition**
Every battle showcases your strategic prowess. Select your hero, gather weapons and equipment, utilize skills – every perfect decision significantly increases your chance of victory!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57575357_824427516402090_4784729604045531903_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=eu4ypAnj9IIQ7kNvgE9rHjg&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdVXAFcK0xmdxgOruqEINoQ&oh=00_AYDwlUdmXv5rLpwQjyRCeR83PaCExYlkeHubbi5KbWPYDQ&oe=6705684F)

**4. Multiplayer lobby, social upgrade**
 A simple handshake can turn you into friends with other players. Invite them to battle alongside you!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569430_428367730175184_5144015448438223949_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fp8Dh8fZOFUQ7kNvgG5v5o6&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdVXAFcK0xmdxgOruqEINoQ&oh=00_AYDIisYiu-yf2qPXGO-m0yRr4zAXOwP_L59kL1GCKhlvBQ&oe=67058125)

**5. Rich weaponry, equipment upgrades**
 With 7 bows, 6 arrow types, 4 attachments, and 3 melee weapons, upgrading them during battle significantly boosts your combat prowess.
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974813_811018704292146_9169147610766946190_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=bDbawR9hbNsQ7kNvgEn7o2Z&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdVXAFcK0xmdxgOruqEINoQ&oh=00_AYD06U0bI98zLb7Lpn_SckXbW_l69gEVAZLtRFgNFFszAA&oe=67057A15)

**6. Diverse systems, continuous updates**
With new gameplay modes, heroes, maps, weapons, and seasonal features, we continuously update to keep the experience fresh.

# Need Help? 
Contact us through Discord, mail, or simply leave a comment. Whether for support or feedback, we are always happy to answer.

# Follow Us:
- Discord: https://discord.gg/hibow
- Twitter:  https://twitter.com/HibowVR
